comments.content:
It must be **[TXT SantaFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042330/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettering-delights/txt-santa-font/)** by Lettering Delights [2006], but it doesn't have swashes on /E & /H

I have found also the same font with a "Copyright 2005 Inspire Graphic" and the basic font looks suspiciously close to **[Goudy Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042330/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Goudy%20Old%20Style%20Bold%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=b13a522dfc5bca1b30820eec3c075f73&fsize=60&text=GOD%20BLESS%20HEATHER&wrap=2)**
